fields.name: action
fields.description: The action that was performed. Can be opened, edited, deleted, transferred, pinned, unpinned, closed, reopened, assigned, unassigned, labeled, unlabeled, locked, unlocked, milestoned, or demilestoned.

fields.name: changes
fields.description: The changes to the issue if the action was edited.

fields.name: assignee
fields.description: The user assigned to the issue, if applicable.

description: Payload schema for IssuesEvent. See documentation for details on the issue, changes, and assignee objects.
